creator: qiuling.chen@aisipu.com
text:
I am a user of jmeter system. 
And now, I want to test our EJB  performance using the Java request sample in 
jmeter.
But  "java request" window,  I fail to add my class into the classname list of 
drop-down menu.

Created attachment 2788
Java protocol description zip file
creator: brad@kiewel.net
brad@kiewel.net
text:
The Java Protocol allows JMeter to use user-written Java code for load testing. 
The user-written code may support a complex or proprietary protocol. For 
example, Java objects may be serialized and passed as part of the HTTP protocol 
payload.  The attachment provides additional information.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text:
Marking all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8's release date as VERIFIED.
Yes, it's pretty poor QA procedure, but there's bugs here lingering since JMeter
1.6, and we need to clean up a little.

creator: jsalvata@atg.com
text: Bulk-closing all bugs RESOLVED before JMeter 1.8 release date.
